Angular Strap

AngularStrap is a set of native directives that enables seamless integration of Bootstrap#^3.0 into your AngularJS#^1.2 application.

With no external dependency except the Bootstrap CSS styles, AngularStrap is light and fast. It has been built from the ground up to leverage ngAnimate!

Quick Start

Inject the mgcrea.ngStrap module into your app (don't forget ngAnimate):

{% highlight js %} angular.module('myApp', ['ngAnimate', 'mgcrea.ngStrap']); {% endhighlight %}

Angular Strap has a bunch of controls. Some of them we've modified to fit SumTotal's style. To see a full list of examples follow the link below.
